Multiple social media platforms shared t: 2. The Facebook page 'Ilyas Sharafuddin Slave Of Allah' shared the video, stating that an egg was thrown at the French head of state. This post received over 89,000 views.
Another Facebook page: Sajid Hashmat', posted the video accusing Macron of disrespecting the Prophet and praising the thrower's aim.
